synopsis.text:
Seeing love as a complex puzzle, Hotaru Hinase, a cheerful high school freshman, has always been content with her fulfilling life surrounded by her loving family and close friends. Her perspective on love takes an unexpected turn when she witnesses Hananoi, a charming and popular classmate, going through a heart-wrenching breakup. In a simple act of kindness, she offers him her umbrella, which sparks a series of events that challenge her understanding of love.

Hananoi, known for his unwavering devotion to the one he loves, becomes captivated by Hotaru's genuine gesture. As he pursues her relentlessly, Hotaru finds herself grappling with unfamiliar emotions. Despite her initial reluctance, she begins to see beyond Hananoi's perfect facade, uncovering the deep loneliness that lies beneath.

As their bond deepens, Hotaru embarks on a journey to unravel the true essence of love and navigate the intricacies of her first romantic relationship. This heartwarming tale follows the blossoming connection between a girl who seeks to understand love and a boy who is wholeheartedly devoted to it.
